title: Leading in ICT Service Exports
description: In 2023, Israel's ICT service exports accounted for 61.77% of its total service exports, the highest percentage globally.

title: Top in R&D Investment
description: In 2022, Israel spent 6.02% of its GDP on research and development, the highest proportion worldwide.

title: Perfect Female Secondary School Enrollment
description: In 2015, Israel achieved a 100% net enrollment rate for females in secondary education, leading globally.

title: Lowest Male Mortality from Major Diseases
description: In 2021, Israel had the lowest mortality rate for males aged 30 to 70 from CVD, cancer, diabetes, or CRD at 8.9%.
